titles: Pithy pleasaunt and profitable workes of maister Skelton, Poete Laureate. Nowe collected and newly published. Anno 1568
author: Skelton, John, 1460?-1529.

publisher: In Fletestreate, neare vnto saint Dunstones churche by Thomas Marshe,
